r6:
**Rainbow Six Siege Statistics**

Use ```pfxr6 cas|casual <username> pc|xbl|psn``` to get a user's stats for casual play.

Use ```pfxr6 rnk|ranked <username> pc|xbl|psn``` to get a user's stats for ranked play.

Use ```pfxr6 topop|operator <username> pc|xbl|psn``` to get a user's stats for their most played operator.
Add a number to the end of the command to go through the list of operators they've played (sorted by time played).

Lastly use ```pfxr6 misc|general <username> pc|xbl|psn``` to get additional stats on a user unrelated to game mode.
remind: Use the `remind me <text> in <time><unit>` command to set reminders for yourself.
